title: The Dead Vet’s Vette
subtitle: A tale about a too-good-to-be true car offered for sale, and the sad story behind it.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Buyer who answers unbelievable ad in paper offering a vintage Corvette for a pittance discovers the car belonged to the seller’s son, who was killed in Vietnam, and is being offered for so low a price because the bereaved mother has no inkling of the vehicle’s true value.
